name: Lots of Blobs
description:
Lots Of Blobs

This game is been developed in three days for the QUARANTINE JAM, the theme of the hackaton was "a lot of" and this prototipe is what we came out with. Blobs everywhere are going to stalk you, run, jump and dash as more as you can, alone or with a friend, survive and make everything explode!!

IMPORTANT: some antivirus may have doubts about running the exe, we guarantee that the download pack is totally safe and clean so don't worry, just shut down the antivirus for a while, it's normal. <3 we'll update more builds soon!


Controls:

MoveJumpDashDrop BombPlayer1A-DWLeft ShiftSPlayer2Left Arrow
Right ArrowUp ArrowRight ShiftDown Arrow

Power Up:

CrossHealth + 25HeartHealth + 75BombBomb +1
